testcase.name: when some names in array uppercase then response is two greetings()
when array of names has one name then greet me simple()
when commas are intentional with escape char then not separate them()
when name is empty then greet as my friend()
when name is uppercase then shout()
when array of names is empty then greet as everyone()
interpolate array of names into simple greeting()
when array of names has more then two names then separate with commas and 'and'()
when string in names array is names separated by comma then split()
